56 ContainerBasePrivate::ContainerBasePrivate(ContainerBase* me, const std::string& name)
57  : StagePrivate(me, name)
58  , required_interface_(UNKNOWN)
59  , pending_backward_(new Interface)
60  , pending_forward_(new Interface) {}
61 
62 ContainerBasePrivate::const_iterator ContainerBasePrivate::childByIndex(int index, bool for_insert) const {
63  if (!for_insert && index < 0)
64  --index;
65  const_iterator position = children_.begin();
66  if (index > 0) {
67  for (auto end = children_.end(); index > 0 && position != end; --index)
68  ++position;
69  } else if (++index <= 0) {
70  container_type::const_reverse_iterator from_end = children_.rbegin();
71  for (auto end = children_.rend(); index < 0 && from_end != end; ++index)
72  ++from_end;
73  position = index < 0 ? children_.end() : from_end.base();
74  }
75  return position;
76 }
77 
78 bool ContainerBasePrivate::traverseStages(const ContainerBase::StageCallback& processor, unsigned int cur_depth,
79  unsigned int max_depth) const {
80  if (cur_depth >= max_depth)
81  return true;
82 
83  for (auto& stage : children_) {
84  if (!processor(*stage, cur_depth))
85  return false;
86  const ContainerBasePrivate* container = dynamic_cast<const ContainerBasePrivate*>(stage->pimpl());
87  if (container)
88  container->traverseStages(processor, cur_depth + 1, max_depth);
89  }
90  return true;
91 }
92 
93 void ContainerBasePrivate::validateConnectivity() const {
94  // recursively validate all children and accumulate errors
95  for (const auto& child : children())
96  child->pimpl()->validateConnectivity();
97 }

99 bool ContainerBasePrivate::canCompute() const {
100  // call the method of the public interface
101  return static_cast<ContainerBase*>(me_)->canCompute();
102 }

104 void ContainerBasePrivate::compute() {
105  // call the method of the public interface
106  static_cast<ContainerBase*>(me_)->compute();
107 }

109 void ContainerBasePrivate::copyState(Interface::iterator external, const InterfacePtr& target, bool updated) {
110  // TODO: update internal's prio from external's new priority
111  if (updated)
112  return;
113 
114  // create a clone of external state within target interface (child's starts() or ends())
115  auto internal = states_.insert(states_.end(), InterfaceState(*external));
116  target->add(*internal);
117  // and remember the mapping between them
118  internal_to_external_.insert(std::make_pair(&*internal, &*external));
119 }
120 
121 void ContainerBasePrivate::liftSolution(const SolutionBasePtr& solution, const InterfaceState* internal_from,
122  const InterfaceState* internal_to) {
123  if (!storeSolution(solution))
124  return;
125 
126  auto find_or_create_external = [this](const InterfaceState* internal, bool& created) -> InterfaceState* {
127  auto it = internal_to_external_.find(internal);
128  if (it != internal_to_external_.end())
129  return it->second;
130 
131  InterfaceState* external = &*states_.insert(states_.end(), InterfaceState(*internal));
132  internal_to_external_.insert(std::make_pair(internal, external));
133  created = true;
134  return external;
135  };
136  bool created_from = false;
137  bool created_to = false;
138  InterfaceState* external_from = find_or_create_external(internal_from, created_from);
139  InterfaceState* external_to = find_or_create_external(internal_to, created_to);
140 
141  // connect solution to start/end state
142  solution->setStartState(*external_from);
143  solution->setEndState(*external_to);
144 
145  // spawn created states in external interfaces
146  if (created_from)
147  prevEnds()->add(*external_from);
148  if (created_to)
149  nextStarts()->add(*external_to);
150 
151  newSolution(solution);
152 }

154 ContainerBase::ContainerBase(ContainerBasePrivate* impl) : Stage(impl) {}

156 size_t ContainerBase::numChildren() const {
157  return pimpl()->children().size();
158 }
159 
160 Stage* ContainerBase::findChild(const std::string& name) const {
161  auto pos = name.find('/');
162  const std::string first = name.substr(0, pos);
163  for (const Stage::pointer& child : pimpl()->children())
164  if (child->name() == first) {
165  if (pos == std::string::npos)
166  return child.get();
167  else if (auto* parent = dynamic_cast<const ContainerBase*>(child.get()))
168  return parent->findChild(name.substr(pos + 1));
169  }
170  return nullptr;
171 }
172 
173 bool ContainerBase::traverseChildren(const ContainerBase::StageCallback& processor) const {
174  return pimpl()->traverseStages(processor, 0, 1);
175 }
176 bool ContainerBase::traverseRecursively(const ContainerBase::StageCallback& processor) const {
177  if (!processor(*this, 0))
178  return false;
179  return pimpl()->traverseStages(processor, 1, UINT_MAX);
180 }
181 
182 void ContainerBase::add(Stage::pointer&& stage) {
183  if (!insert(std::move(stage))) {
184  throw std::runtime_error(name() + ": Could not insert stage");
185  }
186 }
187 
188 bool ContainerBase::insert(Stage::pointer&& stage, int before) {
189  if (!stage) {
190  ROS_ERROR_STREAM(name() << ": received invalid stage pointer");
191  return false;
192  }
193 
194  StagePrivate* impl = stage->pimpl();
195  if (!impl->setParent(this))
196  return false;
197  ContainerBasePrivate::const_iterator where = pimpl()->childByIndex(before, true);
198  ContainerBasePrivate::iterator it = pimpl()->children_.insert(where, std::move(stage));
199  impl->setParentPosition(it);
200  return true;
201 }
202 
203 bool ContainerBasePrivate::remove(ContainerBasePrivate::const_iterator pos) {
204  if (pos == children_.end())
205  return false;
206 
207  (*pos)->pimpl()->unparent();
208  children_.erase(pos);
209  return true;
210 }
211 
212 bool ContainerBase::remove(int pos) {
213  return pimpl()->remove(pimpl()->childByIndex(pos, false));
214 }
215 
216 bool ContainerBase::remove(Stage* child) {
217  auto it = pimpl()->children_.begin(), end = pimpl()->children_.end();
218  for (; it != end && it->get() != child; ++it)
219  ;
220  return pimpl()->remove(it);
221 }
222 
223 void ContainerBase::clear() {
224  pimpl()->children_.clear();
225 }
226 
227 void ContainerBase::reset() {
228  auto impl = pimpl();
229 
230  // recursively reset children
231  for (auto& child : impl->children())
232  child->reset();
233 
234  // clear buffer interfaces
235  impl->pending_backward_->clear();
236  impl->pending_forward_->clear();
237  // ... and state mapping
238  impl->internal_to_external_.clear();
239 
240  // interfaces depend on children which might change
241  impl->required_interface_ = UNKNOWN;
242  impl->starts_.reset();
243  impl->ends_.reset();
244 
245  Stage::reset();
246 }
247 
248 void ContainerBase::init(const moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model) {
249  auto impl = pimpl();
250  auto& children = impl->children();
251 
252  Stage::init(robot_model);
253 
254  // we need to have some children to do the actual work
255  if (children.empty())
256  throw InitStageException(*this, "no children");
257 
258  // recursively init all children and accumulate errors
259  InitStageException errors;
260  for (auto& child : children) {
261  try {
262  child->init(robot_model);
263  } catch (const Property::error& e) {
264  std::ostringstream oss;
265  oss << e.what();
266  pimpl()->composePropertyErrorMsg(e.name(), oss);
267  errors.push_back(*child, oss.str());
268  } catch (InitStageException& e) {
269  errors.append(e);
270  }
271  }
272 
273  if (errors)
274  throw errors;
275 }
276 
277 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const ContainerBase& container) {
278  ContainerBase::StageCallback processor = [&os](const Stage& stage, unsigned int depth) -> bool {
279  os << std::string(2 * depth, ' ') << *stage.pimpl() << std::endl;
280  return true;
281  };
282  container.traverseRecursively(processor);
283  return os;
284 }
285 
286 struct SolutionCollector
287 {
288  SolutionCollector(size_t max_depth) : max_depth(max_depth) {}
289 
290  void operator()(const SolutionSequence::container_type& trace, double cost) {
291 #ifndef NDEBUG
292  // Traced path should not extend past container boundaries, i.e. trace.size() <= max_depth
293  // However, as the Merging-Connect's solution may be composed of several subsolutions, we need to disregard those
294  size_t len = trace.size();
295  const StagePrivate* prev_creator = nullptr;
296  for (const auto& s : trace) {
297  if (s->creator() == prev_creator)
298  --len;
299  else
300  prev_creator = s->creator();
301  }
302  assert(len <= max_depth);
303 #endif
304  solutions.emplace_back(std::make_pair(trace, cost));
305  }
306 
307  typedef std::list<std::pair<SolutionSequence::container_type, double>> SolutionCostPairs;
308  SolutionCostPairs solutions;
309  const size_t max_depth;
310 };
311 
312 void updateStateCosts(const SolutionSequence::container_type& partial_solution_path,
313  const InterfaceState::Priority& prio) {
314  for (const SolutionBase* solution : partial_solution_path) {
315  // here it suffices to update the start state, because the end state is the start state
316  // of the next solution (they are all connected)
317  InterfaceState* state = const_cast<InterfaceState*>(solution->start());
318  if (state->owner())
319  state->owner()->updatePriority(state, prio);
320  }
321  // finally update the end state of the last solution
322  if (partial_solution_path.empty())
323  return;
324  InterfaceState* state = const_cast<InterfaceState*>(partial_solution_path.back()->end());
325  if (state->owner())
326  state->owner()->updatePriority(state, prio);
327 }
328 
329 void SerialContainer::onNewSolution(const SolutionBase& current) {
330  auto impl = pimpl();
331  const StagePrivate* creator = current.creator();
332  auto& children = impl->children();
333 
334  // find number of stages before and after creator stage
335  size_t num_before = 0, num_after = 0;
336  for (auto it = children.begin(), end = children.end(); it != end; ++it, ++num_before)
337  if ((*it)->pimpl() == creator)
338  break;
339  assert(num_before < children.size()); // creator should be one of our children
340  num_after = children.size() - 1 - num_before;
341 
342  SolutionSequence::container_type trace;
343  trace.reserve(children.size());
344 
345  // find all incoming solution paths ending at current solution
346  SolutionCollector incoming(num_before);
347  traverse<Interface::BACKWARD>(current, std::ref(incoming), trace);
348 
349  // find all outgoing solution paths starting at current solution
350  SolutionCollector outgoing(num_after);
351  traverse<Interface::FORWARD>(current, std::ref(outgoing), trace);
352 
353  // collect (and sort) all solutions spanning from start to end of this container
354  ordered<SolutionSequencePtr> sorted;
355  SolutionSequence::container_type solution;
356  solution.reserve(children.size());
357  for (auto& in : incoming.solutions) {
358  for (auto& out : outgoing.solutions) {
359  InterfaceState::Priority prio(static_cast<unsigned int>(in.first.size() + 1 + out.first.size()),
360  in.second + current.cost() + out.second);
361  // found a complete solution path connecting start to end?
362  if (prio.depth() == children.size()) {
363  if (std::isinf(prio.cost()))
364  continue; // don't propagate failures
365  assert(solution.empty());
366  // insert incoming solutions in reverse order
367  solution.insert(solution.end(), in.first.rbegin(), in.first.rend());
368  // insert current solution
369  solution.push_back(&current);
370  // insert outgoing solutions in normal order
371  solution.insert(solution.end(), out.first.begin(), out.first.end());
372  // store solution in sorted list
373  sorted.insert(std::make_shared<SolutionSequence>(std::move(solution), prio.cost(), impl));
374  } else if (prio.depth() > 1) {
375  // update state priorities along the whole partial solution path
376  updateStateCosts(in.first, prio);
377  updateStateCosts({ &current }, prio);
378  updateStateCosts(out.first, prio);
379  }
380  }
381  }
382 
383  // finally store + announce new solutions to external interface
384  for (const auto& solution : sorted)
385  impl->liftSolution(solution, solution->internalStart(), solution->internalEnd());
386 }

388 SerialContainer::SerialContainer(SerialContainerPrivate* impl) : ContainerBase(impl) {}

391 SerialContainerPrivate::SerialContainerPrivate(SerialContainer* me, const std::string& name)
392  : ContainerBasePrivate(me, name) {}
393 
394 void SerialContainerPrivate::connect(StagePrivate& stage1, StagePrivate& stage2) {
395  InterfaceFlags flags1 = stage1.requiredInterface();
396  InterfaceFlags flags2 = stage2.requiredInterface();
397 
398  if ((flags1 & WRITES_NEXT_START) && (flags2 & READS_START))
399  stage1.setNextStarts(stage2.starts());
400  else if ((flags1 & READS_END) && (flags2 & WRITES_PREV_END))
401  stage2.setPrevEnds(stage1.ends());
402  else {
403  boost::format desc("cannot connect end interface of '%1%' (%2%) to start interface of '%3%' (%4%)");
404  desc % stage1.name() % flowSymbol<END_IF_MASK>(flags1);
405  desc % stage2.name() % flowSymbol<START_IF_MASK>(flags2);
406  throw InitStageException(*me(), desc.str());
407  }
408 }
409 
410 template <unsigned int mask>
411 void SerialContainerPrivate::validateInterface(const StagePrivate& child, InterfaceFlags required) const {
412  required = required & mask;
413  if (required == UNKNOWN)
414  return; // cannot yet validate
415  InterfaceFlags child_interface = child.interfaceFlags() & mask;
416  if (required != child_interface) {
417  boost::format desc("%1% interface (%3%) of '%2%' does not match mine (%4%)");
418  desc % (mask == START_IF_MASK ? "start" : "end") % child.name();
419  desc % flowSymbol<mask>(child_interface) % flowSymbol<mask>(required);
420  throw InitStageException(*me_, desc.str());
421  }
422 }
423 
424 // called by parent asking for pruning of this' interface
425 void SerialContainerPrivate::resolveInterface(InterfaceFlags expected) {
426  // we need to have some children to do the actual work
427  if (children().empty())
428  throw InitStageException(*me(), "no children");
429 
430  if (!(expected & START_IF_MASK))
431  throw InitStageException(*me(), "unknown start interface");
432 
433  Stage& first = *children().front();
434  Stage& last = *children().back();
435 
436  InitStageException exceptions;
437 
438  try { // FIRST child
439  first.pimpl()->resolveInterface(expected & START_IF_MASK);
440  // connect first child's (start) push interface
441  setChildsPushBackwardInterface(first.pimpl());
442  // validate that first child's and this container's start interfaces match
443  validateInterface<START_IF_MASK>(*first.pimpl(), expected);
444  // connect first child's (start) pull interface
445  if (const InterfacePtr& target = first.pimpl()->starts())
446  starts_.reset(new Interface(
447  [this, target](Interface::iterator it, bool updated) { this->copyState(it, target, updated); }));
448  } catch (InitStageException& e) {
449  exceptions.append(e);
450  }
451 
452  // process all children and connect them
453  for (auto it = ++children().begin(), previous_it = children().begin(); it != children().end(); ++it, ++previous_it) {
454  try {
455  StagePrivate* child_impl = (**it).pimpl();
456  StagePrivate* previous_impl = (**previous_it).pimpl();
457  child_impl->resolveInterface(invert(previous_impl->requiredInterface()) & START_IF_MASK);
458  connect(*previous_impl, *child_impl);
459  } catch (InitStageException& e) {
460  exceptions.append(e);
461  }
462  }
463 
464  try { // connect last child's (end) push interface
465  setChildsPushForwardInterface(last.pimpl());
466  // validate that last child's and this container's end interfaces match
467  validateInterface<END_IF_MASK>(*last.pimpl(), expected);
468  // connect last child's (end) pull interface
469  if (const InterfacePtr& target = last.pimpl()->ends())
470  ends_.reset(new Interface(
471  [this, target](Interface::iterator it, bool updated) { this->copyState(it, target, updated); }));
472  } catch (InitStageException& e) {
473  exceptions.append(e);
474  }
475 
476  required_interface_ = first.pimpl()->interfaceFlags() & START_IF_MASK | last.pimpl()->interfaceFlags() & END_IF_MASK;
477 
478  if (exceptions)
479  throw exceptions;
480 }
481 
482 void SerialContainerPrivate::validateConnectivity() const {
483  ContainerBasePrivate::validateConnectivity();
484 
485  InterfaceFlags mine = interfaceFlags();
486  // check that input / output interface of first / last child matches this' resp. interface
487  validateInterface<START_IF_MASK>(*children().front()->pimpl(), mine);
488  validateInterface<END_IF_MASK>(*children().back()->pimpl(), mine);
489 
490  // validate connectivity of children between each other
491  // ContainerBasePrivate::validateConnectivity() ensures that required push interfaces are present,
492  // that is, neighbouring stages have a corresponding pull interface.
493  // Here, it remains to check that - if a child has a pull interface - it's indeed feeded.
494  for (auto cur = children().begin(), end = children().end(); cur != end; ++cur) {
495  const StagePrivate* const cur_impl = **cur;
496  InterfaceFlags required = cur_impl->interfaceFlags();
497 
498  // get iterators to prev / next stage in sequence
499  auto prev = cur;
500  --prev;
501  auto next = cur;
502  ++next;
503 
504  // start pull interface fed?
505  if (cur != children().begin() && // first child has not a previous one
506  (required & READS_START) && !(*prev)->pimpl()->nextStarts())
507  throw InitStageException(**cur, "start interface is not fed");
508 
509  // end pull interface fed?
510  if (next != end && // last child has not a next one
511  (required & READS_END) && !(*next)->pimpl()->prevEnds())
512  throw InitStageException(**cur, "end interface is not fed");
513  }
514 }
515 
516 bool SerialContainer::canCompute() const {
517  for (const auto& stage : pimpl()->children()) {
518  if (stage->pimpl()->canCompute())
519  return true;
520  }
521  return false;
522 }
523 
524 void SerialContainer::compute() {
525  for (const auto& stage : pimpl()->children()) {
526  try {
527  if (!stage->pimpl()->canCompute())
528  continue;
529 
530  ROS_DEBUG("Computing stage '%s'", stage->name().c_str());
531  stage->pimpl()->runCompute();
532  } catch (const Property::error& e) {
533  stage->reportPropertyError(e);
534  }
535  }
536 }
537 
538 template <Interface::Direction dir>
539 void SerialContainer::traverse(const SolutionBase& start, const SolutionProcessor& cb,
540  SolutionSequence::container_type& trace, double trace_cost) {
541  const InterfaceState::Solutions& solutions = start.trajectories<dir>();
542  if (solutions.empty()) // if we reached the end, call the callback
543  cb(trace, trace_cost);
544  else
545  for (SolutionBase* successor : solutions) {
546  trace.push_back(successor);
547  trace_cost += successor->cost();
548 
549  traverse<dir>(*successor, cb, trace, trace_cost);
550 
551  trace_cost -= successor->cost();
552  trace.pop_back();
553  }
554 }
555 
556 void WrappedSolution::fillMessage(moveit_task_constructor_msgs::Solution& solution,
557  Introspection* introspection) const {
558  wrapped_->fillMessage(solution, introspection);
559 
560  // prepend this solutions info as a SubSolution msg
561  moveit_task_constructor_msgs::SubSolution sub_msg;
562  SolutionBase::fillInfo(sub_msg.info, introspection);
563  sub_msg.sub_solution_id.push_back(introspection ? introspection->solutionId(*wrapped_) : 0);
564  solution.sub_solution.insert(solution.sub_solution.begin(), std::move(sub_msg));
565 }
566 
567 ParallelContainerBasePrivate::ParallelContainerBasePrivate(ParallelContainerBase* me, const std::string& name)
568  : ContainerBasePrivate(me, name) {}
569 
570 void ParallelContainerBasePrivate::resolveInterface(InterfaceFlags expected) {
571  // we need to have some children to do the actual work
572  if (children().empty())
573  throw InitStageException(*me(), "no children");
574 
575  InitStageException exceptions;
576 
577  bool first = true;
578  for (const Stage::pointer& child : children()) {
579  try {
580  auto child_impl = child->pimpl();
581  child_impl->resolveInterface(expected);
582  validateInterfaces(*child_impl, expected, first);
583  // initialize push connections of children according to their demands
584  setChildsPushForwardInterface(child_impl);
585  setChildsPushBackwardInterface(child_impl);
586  first = false;
587  } catch (InitStageException& e) {
588  exceptions.append(e);
589  continue;
590  }
591  }
592 
593  if (exceptions)
594  throw exceptions;
595 
596  // States received by the container need to be copied to all children's pull interfaces.
597  if (expected & READS_START)
598  starts().reset(new Interface([this](Interface::iterator external, bool updated) {
599  this->onNewExternalState(Interface::FORWARD, external, updated);
600  }));
601  if (expected & READS_END)
602  ends().reset(new Interface([this](Interface::iterator external, bool updated) {
603  this->onNewExternalState(Interface::BACKWARD, external, updated);
604  }));
605 
606  required_interface_ = expected;
607 }
608 
609 void ParallelContainerBasePrivate::validateInterfaces(const StagePrivate& child, InterfaceFlags& external,
610  bool first) const {
611  const InterfaceFlags child_interface = child.requiredInterface();
612  bool valid = true;
613  for (InterfaceFlags mask : { START_IF_MASK, END_IF_MASK }) {
614  if ((external & mask) == UNKNOWN)
615  external |= child_interface & mask;
616 
617  valid = valid & ((external & mask) == (child_interface & mask));
618  }
619 
620  if (!valid) {
621  boost::format desc("interface of '%1%' (%3% %4%) does not match %2% (%5% %6%).");
622  desc % child.name();
623  desc % (first ? "external one" : "other children's");
624  desc % flowSymbol<START_IF_MASK>(child_interface) % flowSymbol<END_IF_MASK>(child_interface);
625  desc % flowSymbol<START_IF_MASK>(external) % flowSymbol<END_IF_MASK>(external);
626  throw InitStageException(*me_, desc.str());
627  }
628 }
629 
630 void ParallelContainerBasePrivate::validateConnectivity() const {
631  InterfaceFlags my_interface = interfaceFlags();
632 
633  // check that input / output interfaces of all children are handled by my interface
634  for (const auto& child : children())
635  validateInterfaces(*child->pimpl(), my_interface);
636 
637  ContainerBasePrivate::validateConnectivity();
638 }
639 
640 void ParallelContainerBasePrivate::onNewExternalState(Interface::Direction dir, Interface::iterator external,
641  bool updated) {
642  for (const Stage::pointer& stage : children())
643  copyState(external, stage->pimpl()->pullInterface(dir), updated);
644 }

646 ParallelContainerBase::ParallelContainerBase(ParallelContainerBasePrivate* impl) : ContainerBase(impl) {}
647 ParallelContainerBase::ParallelContainerBase(const std::string& name)
648  : ParallelContainerBase(new ParallelContainerBasePrivate(this, name)) {}
649 
650 void ParallelContainerBase::liftSolution(const SolutionBase& solution, double cost, std::string comment) {
651  auto impl = pimpl();
652  impl->liftSolution(std::make_shared<WrappedSolution>(impl, &solution, cost, std::move(comment)), solution.start(),
653  solution.end());
654 }
655 
656 void ParallelContainerBase::spawn(InterfaceState&& state, SubTrajectory&& t) {
657  pimpl()->StagePrivate::spawn(std::move(state), std::make_shared<SubTrajectory>(std::move(t)));
658 }
659 
660 void ParallelContainerBase::sendForward(const InterfaceState& from, InterfaceState&& to, SubTrajectory&& t) {
661  pimpl()->StagePrivate::sendForward(from, std::move(to), std::make_shared<SubTrajectory>(std::move(t)));
662 }
663 
664 void ParallelContainerBase::sendBackward(InterfaceState&& from, const InterfaceState& to, SubTrajectory&& t) {
665  pimpl()->StagePrivate::sendBackward(std::move(from), to, std::make_shared<SubTrajectory>(std::move(t)));
666 }

668 WrapperBasePrivate::WrapperBasePrivate(WrapperBase* me, const std::string& name)
669  : ParallelContainerBasePrivate(me, name) {}
670 
671 WrapperBase::WrapperBase(const std::string& name, Stage::pointer&& child)
672  : WrapperBase(new WrapperBasePrivate(this, name), std::move(child)) {}
673 
674 WrapperBase::WrapperBase(WrapperBasePrivate* impl, Stage::pointer&& child) : ParallelContainerBase(impl) {
675  if (child)
676  WrapperBase::insert(std::move(child));
677 }
678 
679 bool WrapperBase::insert(Stage::pointer&& stage, int before) {
680  // restrict num of children to one
681  if (numChildren() > 0)
682  return false;
683  return ParallelContainerBase::insert(std::move(stage), before);
684 }
685 
686 Stage* WrapperBase::wrapped() {
687  return pimpl()->children().empty() ? nullptr : pimpl()->children().front().get();
688 }
689 
690 bool WrapperBase::canCompute() const {
691  return wrapped()->pimpl()->canCompute();
692 }
693 
694 void WrapperBase::compute() {
695  try {
696  wrapped()->pimpl()->runCompute();
697  } catch (const Property::error& e) {
698  wrapped()->reportPropertyError(e);
699  }
700 }
701 
702 bool Alternatives::canCompute() const {
703  for (const auto& stage : pimpl()->children())
704  if (stage->pimpl()->canCompute())
705  return true;
706  return false;
707 }
708 
709 void Alternatives::compute() {
710  for (const auto& stage : pimpl()->children()) {
711  try {
712  stage->pimpl()->runCompute();
713  } catch (const Property::error& e) {
714  stage->reportPropertyError(e);
715  }
716  }
717 }
718 
719 void Alternatives::onNewSolution(const SolutionBase& s) {
720  liftSolution(s);
721 }
722 
723 void Fallbacks::reset() {
724  active_child_ = nullptr;
725  ParallelContainerBase::reset();
726 }
727 
728 void Fallbacks::init(const moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model) {
729  ParallelContainerBase::init(robot_model);
730  active_child_ = pimpl()->children().front().get();
731 }
732 
733 bool Fallbacks::canCompute() const {
734  while (active_child_) {
735  StagePrivate* child = active_child_->pimpl();
736  if (child->canCompute())
737  return true;
738 
739  // active child failed, continue with next
740  auto next = child->it();
741  ++next;
742  active_child_ = next->get();
743  }
744  return false;
745 }
746 
747 void Fallbacks::compute() {
748  if (!active_child_)
749  return;
750 
751  try {
752  active_child_->pimpl()->runCompute();
753  } catch (const Property::error& e) {
754  active_child_->reportPropertyError(e);
755  }
756 }
757 
758 void Fallbacks::onNewSolution(const SolutionBase& s) {
759  liftSolution(s);
760 }
761 
762 MergerPrivate::MergerPrivate(Merger* me, const std::string& name) : ParallelContainerBasePrivate(me, name) {}
763 
764 void MergerPrivate::resolveInterface(InterfaceFlags expected) {
765  ContainerBasePrivate::resolveInterface(expected);
766  switch (interfaceFlags()) {
767  case PROPAGATE_FORWARDS:
768  case PROPAGATE_BACKWARDS:
769  case UNKNOWN:
770  break; // these are supported
771 
772  case GENERATE:
773  throw InitStageException(*me_, "Generator stages not yet supported.");
774  case CONNECT:
775  throw InitStageException(*me_, "Cannot merge connecting stages. Use Connect.");
776  default:
777  throw InitStageException(*me_, "Children's interface not supported.");
778  }
779 }
780 
781 Merger::Merger(const std::string& name) : Merger(new MergerPrivate(this, name)) {}
782 
783 void Merger::reset() {
784  ParallelContainerBase::reset();
785  auto impl = pimpl();
786  impl->jmg_merged_.reset();
787  impl->source_state_to_solutions_.clear();
788 }
789 
790 void Merger::init(const core::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model) {
791  ParallelContainerBase::init(robot_model);
792 }
793 
794 Merger::Merger(MergerPrivate* impl) : ParallelContainerBase(impl) {}
795 
796 bool Merger::canCompute() const {
797  for (const auto& stage : pimpl()->children())
798  if (stage->pimpl()->canCompute())
799  return true;
800  return false;
801 }
802 
803 void Merger::compute() {
804  for (const auto& stage : pimpl()->children()) {
805  try {
806  stage->pimpl()->runCompute();
807  } catch (const Property::error& e) {
808  stage->reportPropertyError(e);
809  }
810  }
811 }
812 
813 void Merger::onNewSolution(const SolutionBase& s) {
814  auto impl = pimpl();
815  switch (impl->interfaceFlags()) {
816  case PROPAGATE_FORWARDS:
817  case PROPAGATE_BACKWARDS:
818  impl->onNewPropagateSolution(s);
819  break;
820  case GENERATE:
821  impl->onNewGeneratorSolution(s);
822  break;
823  default:
824  assert(false);
825  }
826 }
827 
828 void MergerPrivate::onNewPropagateSolution(const SolutionBase& s) {
829  const SubTrajectory* trajectory = dynamic_cast<const SubTrajectory*>(&s);
830  if (!trajectory) {
831  ROS_ERROR_NAMED("Merger", "Only simple trajectories are supported");
832  return;
833  }
834 
835  InterfaceFlags dir = interfaceFlags();
836  assert(dir == PROPAGATE_FORWARDS || dir == PROPAGATE_BACKWARDS);
837  // internal source state
838  const InterfaceState* source_state = (dir == PROPAGATE_FORWARDS) ? s.start() : s.end();
839 
840  // map to external source state that is shared by all children
841  auto source_it = internalToExternalMap().find(source_state);
842  // internal->external mapping for source state should have been created
843  assert(source_it != internalToExternalMap().end());
844  InterfaceState* external_source_state = &*source_it->second;
845 
846  // retrieve (or create if necessary) the ChildSolutionMap for the given external source state
847  ChildSolutionMap& all_solutions =
848  source_state_to_solutions_.insert(std::make_pair(external_source_state, ChildSolutionMap())).first->second;
849 
850  // retrieve (or create if necessary) the ChildSolutionList corresponding to the child
851  ChildSolutionList& child_solutions =
852  all_solutions.insert(std::make_pair(s.creator(), ChildSolutionList())).first->second;
853  // insert the new child solution into the list
854  child_solutions.push_back(trajectory);
855 
856  // do we have solutions for all children?
857  if (all_solutions.size() < children().size())
858  return;
859  assert(all_solutions.size() == children().size());
860 
861  // combine the new solution with all solutions from other children
862  auto spawner = dir == PROPAGATE_FORWARDS ? &MergerPrivate::sendForward : &MergerPrivate::sendBackward;
863  mergeAnyCombination(all_solutions, s, external_source_state->scene(),
864  std::bind(spawner, this, std::placeholders::_1, external_source_state));
865 }
866 
867 void MergerPrivate::sendForward(SubTrajectory&& t, const InterfaceState* from) {
868  // generate target state
869  planning_scene::PlanningScenePtr to = from->scene()->diff();
870  to->setCurrentState(t.trajectory()->getLastWayPoint());
871  StagePrivate::sendForward(*from, InterfaceState(to), std::make_shared<SubTrajectory>(std::move(t)));
872 }
873 
874 void MergerPrivate::sendBackward(SubTrajectory&& t, const InterfaceState* to) {
875  // generate target state
876  planning_scene::PlanningScenePtr from = to->scene()->diff();
877  from->setCurrentState(t.trajectory()->getFirstWayPoint());
878  StagePrivate::sendBackward(InterfaceState(from), *to, std::make_shared<SubTrajectory>(std::move(t)));
879 }
880 
881 void MergerPrivate::onNewGeneratorSolution(const SolutionBase& s) {
882  // TODO: implement in similar fashion as onNewPropagateSolution(), but also merge start/end states
883 }
884 
885 void MergerPrivate::mergeAnyCombination(const ChildSolutionMap& all_solutions, const SolutionBase& current,
886  const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr& start_scene,
887  const Spawner& spawner) {
888  std::vector<size_t> indeces; // which solution index was considered last for i-th child?
889  indeces.reserve(children().size());
890 
891  ChildSolutionList sub_solutions;
892  sub_solutions.reserve(children().size());
893 
894  // initialize vector of sub solutions
895  for (const auto& pair : all_solutions) {
896  // all children, except current solution's creator, start with zero index
897  indeces.push_back(pair.first != current.creator() ? 0 : pair.second.size() - 1);
898  sub_solutions.push_back(pair.second[indeces.back()]);
899  }
900  while (true) {
901  merge(sub_solutions, start_scene, spawner);
902 
903  // compose next combination
904  size_t child = 0;
905  for (auto it = all_solutions.cbegin(), end = all_solutions.cend(); it != end; ++it, ++child) {
906  if (it->first == current.creator())
907  continue; // skip current solution's child
908  if (++indeces[child] >= it->second.size()) {
909  indeces[child] = 0; // start over with zero
910  sub_solutions[child] = it->second[indeces[child]];
911  continue; // and continue with next child
912  }
913  // otherwise, a new solution combination is available
914  sub_solutions[child] = it->second[indeces[child]];
915  break;
916  }
917  if (child == children().size()) // all combinations exhausted?
918  break;
919  }
920 }
921 
922 void MergerPrivate::merge(const ChildSolutionList& sub_solutions,
923  const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr& start_scene, const Spawner& spawner) {
924  // transform vector of SubTrajectories into vector of RobotTrajectories
925  std::vector<robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectoryConstPtr> sub_trajectories;
926  sub_trajectories.reserve(sub_solutions.size());
927  for (const auto& sub : sub_solutions) {
928  // TODO: directly skip failures in mergeAnyCombination() or even earlier
929  if (sub->isFailure())
930  return;
931  if (sub->trajectory())
932  sub_trajectories.push_back(sub->trajectory());
933  }
934 
935  moveit::core::JointModelGroup* jmg = jmg_merged_.get();
936  robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectoryPtr merged;
937  try {
938  merged = task_constructor::merge(sub_trajectories, start_scene->getCurrentState(), jmg);
939  } catch (const std::runtime_error& e) {
940  ROS_INFO_STREAM_NAMED("Merger", this->name() << "Merging failed: " << e.what());
941  return;
942  }
943  if (jmg_merged_.get() != jmg)
944  jmg_merged_.reset(jmg);
945  if (!merged)
946  return;
947 
948  // check merged trajectory for collisions
949  if (!start_scene->isPathValid(*merged))
950  return;
951 
952  SubTrajectory t(merged);
953  // accumulate costs and markers
954  double costs = 0.0;
955  for (const auto& sub : sub_solutions) {
956  costs += sub->cost();
957  t.markers().insert(t.markers().end(), sub->markers().begin(), sub->markers().end());
958  }
959  t.setCost(costs);
960  spawner(std::move(t));
961 }
962 } // namespace task_constructor
963 } // namespace moveit
